title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 635.4 - Reimbursement for MA provided to persons who are disabled (MA-AD cases)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 635.4 - Reimbursement for MA provided to persons who are disabled (MA-AD cases)

State Regulations

When a recipient of MA-only has been certified as
permanently and totally disabled, Federal reimbursement shall be claimed for
medical services rendered from either the date that the disability was
confirmed, or the first day of the third month preceding the month in which an
application for MA was made, whichever occurred last. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
635.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
